name: Shivashish Rawat
college: Guru Tegh Bahadur Institute of Technology

education.school: Guru Tegh Bahadur Institute of Technology

projects.name: FastEat
projects.description: Engineered FastEat, a Recipe Finder App, developing a robust frontend using ReactJS and enhancing visual appeal with sophisticated SCSS styling techniques. Designed an intuitive user interface for FastEat, enabling seamless navigation and efficient recipe searches. Implemented data fetching from the MealDB API using Axios Library, ensuring real-time recipe updates. Optimized the application's layout and functionality for responsiveness on a variety of devices, thus significantly enhancing the user experience and accessibility.

projects.name: Blog App
projects.description: Created a full-stack Blog App using ReactJS for the frontend and npm server for the backend. Designed the user interface for creating, editing and managing blog posts, allowing users to perform CRUD operations. Utilized Axios for efficient HTTP communication between the frontend and backend, enabling robust data retrieval and management for blog posts. Integrated a responsive design to ensure seamless user interaction on both desktop and mobile platforms.

experiences.description: Developed GoodHire, SAAS platform which will be a handy tool for Human Resource Department for hiring people, Frontend using ReactJS and Tailwind CSS from scratch. Collaborated closely with backend developers to integrate over 10 distinct APIs, ensuring smooth communication and data exchange between frontend and backend systems. Implemented robust RESTful APIs using Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB for defect analysis features in NyaayAI, leading to a 50% improvement in data processing times and enabling faster defect resolution workflows. Created interactive component with React.js and Tailwind CSS to display defects added by multiple users on specific documents, enhancing the visual presentation and user experience.

full_output.name: Shivashish Rawat
